nodes.title: Microgravity Effects on Plant Growth
nodes.author: Dr. A. Jones
nodes.summary: Investigates the cellular and molecular responses of Arabidopsis thaliana to long-duration microgravity exposure on the ISS.

nodes.title: Radiation Shielding with Lunar Regolith
nodes.author: Dr. B. Smith
nodes.summary: Examines the efficacy of compacted lunar regolith as a shielding material against galactic cosmic rays (GCR).

nodes.title: Gene Expression Changes in Space-Flown Rodents
nodes.author: Dr. C. Lee
nodes.summary: A comprehensive study of transcriptomic changes in various tissues of rodents after a 30-day mission.

nodes.title: Photosynthesis in Simulated Martian Atmosphere
nodes.author: Dr. D. Patel
nodes.summary: Analyzes the efficiency of photosynthesis in cyanobacteria under low-pressure, high-CO2 conditions simulating Mars.

nodes.title: Cellular Adaptation to Microgravity in Arabidopsis
nodes.author: Dr. E. Williams
nodes.summary: A follow-up study focusing on the proteomic and metabolomic shifts that accompany genetic changes in microgravity.

nodes.title: Advanced Materials for GCR Shielding
nodes.author: Dr. F. Garcia
nodes.summary: Development of novel hydrogen-rich polymer composites for enhanced GCR shielding in deep space habitats.

nodes.title: Musculoskeletal Atrophy in Simulated Microgravity
nodes.author: Dr. G. Chen
nodes.summary: Utilizes rodent models to test countermeasures for muscle and bone loss during long-duration spaceflight.

nodes.title: Cultivating Crops on Mars: A Review
nodes.author: Dr. H. Brown
nodes.summary: A literature review on the challenges and potential solutions for growing food crops in Martian soil simulants.
